import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { MDBContainer, MDBBtn, MDBModal, MDBModalBody, MDBModalHeader, MDBModalFooter, MDBCol, MDBRow } from 'mdbreact'; class AboutModel extends Component { state = { modal16: false } toggle = nr => () => { let modalNumber = 'modal' + nr this.setState({ [modalNumber]: !this.state[modalNumber] }); } render() { return ( MDBModal MDBModal title .col-md-4 .col-md-4 .ml-auto
.col-md-3 .ml-auto .col-md-2 .ml-auto .col-md-6 .ml-5
Level 1: .col-sm-9 Level 2: .col-8 .col-sm-6 Level 2: .col-4 .col-sm-6 Close Save changes ); } } export default AboutModel;
